headline: US electric grids brace for scorching heat as energy prices surge
summary: NEW YORK -U.S. grid operators on Monday directed power plants to maximize their output as wholesale electricity prices skyrocketed during a dangerous heat wave afflicting the eastern half of the...

headline: NYC Heat Triggers Blackout as Soaring Temperatures Stress US Grids
